title: durusugA krpajUci
sahitya:
durusugA krpajUci santatamarOga drDha sharIramuga salupu nanu


anupallavi

  parama pAvani krpAvani vinutapada sarOja praNatArthihAru rANi 
parAku dharma samvardhanI bahu paraAk-kamala guNA tripurasundari


caraNam 1    nI sannidhini jEri golicina ninnepuDu dalacE sujana dAsajana 
bhAgyameTu telupudunO O sakala pApa shamanI vinu OmkAri
niyatiyaTulanu (amba) nI sATevarE jagambulanu nE niratamu ninu goliciti
    caraNam 2    EmO kalatacendi manamuna nE neccaTa gatigAnakanu nI 
mahimalella cevulAraga vini I manasulOni veta dIrcuTakIvELa
bahu nipuNAvani kAmAkSI nIvE vErevarugAdani dalaci golicitini
    caraNam 3    dhAradharavinIla kaca lasitA sarasa kavitA nicitA sAra ghana
sArasita darahAsitA vAriruha vAri vadanOcitA vAgIshanutA bhrtanutA 
nArAyaNI shyAmakrSNa vinutA nA manavini vinu giri sutA
